sn2.28:1.1: Standing to one side, the godling Nandivisāla addressed the Buddha in verse:
sn2.28:2.1: “Four are its wheels, and nine its doors;
sn2.28:2.2: it’s stuffed full, bound with greed,
sn2.28:2.4: Great hero, how will I keep going?”
sn2.28:3.3: and having plucked out craving, root and all:
sn2.28:3.4: that’s how you will keep going.”
